title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 446.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 446.1 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part adds standards for the establishment and
operation of designated emergency foster family boarding homes. Such homes
would be exclusively designated to provide temporary care to children who enter
foster care in a crisis situation which is expected to be resolved within 60
days. The regulations contain provisions concerning eligibility for designated
emergency foster family boarding home care, reimbursement for designated
emergency foster family boarding home care, the required training of foster
parents who provide designated emergency foster care services and the services
to be provided to children receiving care in designated emergency foster family
boarding homes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
446.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
